items.name: steak knife
items.description: You picked up a steak knife, great for cutting, sicing, even in combat.

items.name: kitchen knife
items.description: You picked up a kitchen knife, not so sharp but good for cutting up food!

items.name: old knife
items.description: You picked up an old, ritual knife. This one is different than other knife. It's sharper than one can see.

items.name: jacket
items.description: You grabbed the jacket. Good to keep you cozy and looking nice.
